mapper.select: SELECT R.RESV_NO AS RESV_NO, R.PAYMENT AS PAYMENT, R.RESV_DT AS RESV_DT, R.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID, R.CLASS_NO AS CLASS_NO, C.CLASS_NM AS CLASS_NM FROM RESERVATIONS R JOIN CLASS C ON R.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO

SELECT R.RESV_NO RESV_NO, R.PAYMENT PAYMENT, R.RESV_DT RESV_DT, R.MEMBER_ID MEMBER_ID, R.CLASS_NO CLASS_NO, C.CLASS_NM CLASS_NM, COALESCE(RV.REVIEW_NO, 0) REVIEW_NO FROM RESERVATIONS R JOIN CLASS C ON R.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEWS RV ON R.CLASS_NO = RV.CLASS_NO WHERE R.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATIONS ( PAYMENT, RESV_DT, CLASS_NO, MEMBER_ID ) VALUES ( #{payment}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), #{classNo}, #{memberId} )
